description: If you like walking, our advice is to approach this restaurant on foot from the lively Corso Umberto, taking the steps up to the Duomo di San Giorgio and then enjoying a pleasant stroll through the alleyways of picturesque Modica Alta, where the restaurant is situated. In this simple setting, the focus here is on the remarkable quality of the cuisine, which includes an eclectic array of Sicilian dishes alongside more creative options, all of which showcase expert technique and stunning flavours.
